directions: Combine sweet potatoes, bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, carrots, and garlic in a slow cooker; mix well. Stir in grated ginger and chopped chile. Pour in coconut milk. Stir in 2 tablespoons cilantro and cumin. Add lemongrass, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Cook on Low for 6 to 7 hours.
Remove lemongrass and blend soup with a stick blender to desired consistency. Add lime juice; season with salt and pepper. Garnish with remaining 2 tablespoons cilantro.
ingredients: 4 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut in 1-inch chunks
3  red bell peppers, quartered and seeded
1 (14 ounce) can peeled Italian plum tomatoes
3  carrots, peeled and chopped into 1-inch pieces
1 (1 1/2 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Thai Slow Cooker Winter Vegetable Soup
